faqs.question: Who owns the data uploaded to your system?
faqs.answer: All data belongs to the client. We do not claim ownership of any documents, files, or information provided by clients.

faqs.question: Do you use client data to train artificial intelligence models?
faqs.answer: No. We do not use client data for training, research, or any purpose outside of providing the service.

faqs.question: What happens when a client deletes data?
faqs.answer: When data is deleted, it is permanently removed from our system. We do not keep hidden copies or backups of deleted material.

faqs.question: Do you share client data with third parties?
faqs.answer: No. Client data is not sold, rented, or shared with any third party.

faqs.question: Do you keep records of client files or monitor their contents?
faqs.answer: No. We do not keep logs or records of the contents of client files. Our system only keeps technical information necessary to keep the service running, but never the client's case materials.

faqs.question: How do you protect sensitive information?
faqs.answer: All communication with our system is protected. Files are stored securely and are not accessible to outside parties. We regularly update our systems to maintain security.
